General.Name: Guangzhou Jinyi Media Corp
General.Description: Guangzhou Jinyi Media Corporation engages in the theater operation and film related businesses in China. It is also involved in the television production business. The company was formerly known as Guangzhou Jin Yi Movie Investment Group Company Limited and changed its name to Guangzhou Jinyi Media Corporation in December 2010. Guangzhou Jinyi Media Corporation was founded in 2004 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

3.Name: Mr. Bin Biao  Xu
3.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of Board of Directors & Director
